title: Wedding Planner Use Case
name: Wedding Planner Use Case
description: This use case focuses on the wedding planner's need to identify suitable venues, understand necessary permits, and locate photogenic areas for wedding photos. The goal is to provide personalized recommendations to clients and ensure a smooth, well-organized planning process. By addressing these specific needs, the wedding planner can create a seamless experience that aligns with the clients' preferences while handling all logistical requirements efficiently.
